gateway.title: Let's help you get started
gateway.description: Select your business type and we'll explain what information you'll need to complete this application.

infoAlert.title: Is this you?
infoAlert.description: To keep your account details safe, we expect that the person completing this application holds primary control over financial and business operations for the business. If this is not you, please don't proceed below.

personalDetails.legalNameDescription: Your full name as recorded with government agencies

overview.title: Overview
overview.infoAlert: Your data will be saved as you go.

verifyBusinessSection.title: Verify your business

reviewInProgress.title: Great work!
reviewInProgress.description: Please hang tight while we verify your details. This should only take a moment.

documentsReceived.title: We have your documents
documentsReceived.description: Please hang tight if you can while we verify your documents.

informationRequested.description: We're having trouble verifying your business. Please provide supporting documentation.

declined.title: Application declined
declined.description: We're sorry, but we cannot proceed with your application at this time.

approved.title: All set!
approved.description: Your business details have been verified

verifyBusinessSection.changeWarning: If you change this after starting the application, you may lose your saved progress.

bankAccountSection.title: Link a bank account for payouts

companyIdentification.contactPlatformOperator: If your business is outside of the United States, please contact Platform operator.

validation.pattern: Suffix can only contain letters, periods, and roman numerals

controllerJobTitle.label: Job title
controllerJobTitle.description: Your current position in the organization

controllerJobTitleDescription.label: Job title description
controllerJobTitleDescription.description: Brief description of your role and responsibilities

validation.required: Description is required when job title is Other.

natureOfOwnership.label: Nature of ownership
natureOfOwnership.description: How you own or control the organization

countryOfResidence.label: Country of residence
countryOfResidence.description: Please select your current country of residence

validation.onlyUS: Only US is supported at this time

controllerIds.idType.label: ID type
controllerIds.idType.tooltip: should match your individual ID type

controllerIds.description.label: Description
controllerIds.description.tooltip: should match your business registration documents ID description

validation.maxLength: Description must be 100 characters or less

controllerIds.expiryDate.label: Expiry date
controllerIds.expiryDate.description: Date when the individual ID expires
controllerIds.expiryDate.tooltip: Date when the individual ID expires

validation.format: Expiry date must be in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format
validation.past: Expiry date cannot be in the past
validation.tooFar: Expiry date cannot be more than 10 years in the future

controllerIds.issuer.label: Issuer
controllerIds.issuer.tooltip: should match your business registration documents ID issuer

validation.exactlyTwoChars: Issuer must be a 2-letter country code

industry.label: Industry classification
industry.placeholder: Search by keyword or 6-digit NAICS code

description.default: Please enter this exactly as it appears on your business registration documents
description.soleProp: Your sole proprietorship's name is the same as your legal name. Update it in the personal details section.

organizationIdEin.label: $t(onboarding-overview:idValueLabels.EIN)

description.soleProp: Update your ID in the personal details section

organizationIdEin.tooltip: Should match your business registration document's ID value

options.yes: Yes, my business has an EIN
options.no: No, my business does not have an EIN

description.default: Provide the best email address to contact the business

validation.pattern: Address can only contain letters, numbers, and basic punctuation
Postal code must be exactly 5 digits
Address can only contain letters, numbers, and basic punctuation

validation.minItems: At least {{count}} address line is required

addresses.sectionDescription: Please provide the address registered to your company with your local authority

validation.pattern: Address can only contain letters, numbers, and basic punctuation
Postal code must be exactly 5 digits
Address can only contain letters, numbers, and basic punctuation

validation.minItems: At least {{count}} address line is required

validation.minItems_one: At least one address is required
validation.uniqueTypes: Each address type must be unique

dbaNameNotAvailable.label: Same as legal name of the company

websiteNotAvailable.label: My business doesn't have a website

website.label: Business website
website.description: Please provide a URL for your business

organizationDescription.label: Business description
organizationDescription.description: Please provide a summary of the products and services you offer to consumers. 1,000 characters maximum. Please don't use special characters (e.g. * @ %, etc).

tooltipContent.exampleText: {Business name} creates sustainable and affordable beauty and hair care products that are vegan and cruelty free. Our top selling products are our organic citrus shampoo and conditioner line as well as our paraben and sulfate free mascara.
tooltipContent.alignmentNote: Please ensure this aligns with the business classification you have selected.
tooltipContent.visibilityText: No. This is used for compliance and regulatory purposes only.

idValueDescriptions.EIN: A unique nine-digit number, assigned by the IRS, that identifies your company as a business operating in the United States.
idValueDescriptions.BUSINESS_REGISTRATION_ID: A unique ID assigned by the state or province where your business is registered.
idValueDescriptions.BUSINESS_NUMBER: A unique number assigned by the Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) to identify your business.
idValueDescriptions.BUSINESS_REGISTRATION_NUMBER: A unique number assigned by the state or province where your business is registered.

organizationTypeDescriptions.LIMITED_LIABILITY_COMPANY: A company owned by one or more members and managed by one or more managers.
organizationTypeDescriptions.LIMITED_LIABILITY_PARTNERSHIP: A partnership where all owners, or limited partners, have limited liability.
organizationTypeDescriptions.GENERAL_PARTNERSHIP: A partnership where all owners, or general partners, have unlimited liability.
organizationTypeDescriptions.LIMITED_PARTNERSHIP: A partnership between one or more limited partners and a general partner.
organizationTypeDescriptions.C_CORPORATION: A company owned by shareholders and managed by a board of directors and other officers.
organizationTypeDescriptions.S_CORPORATION: An S Corporation is a corporation that meets the IRS requirements to be taxed under Subchapter S of the Internal Revenue Code.
organizationTypeDescriptions.PARTNERSHIP: A Partnership is a business structure in which two or more individuals manage and operate a business in accordance with the terms and objectives set out in a Partnership Deed.
organizationTypeDescriptions.PUBLICLY_TRADED_COMPANY: A Publicly Traded Company is a company that has issued securities through an initial public offering (IPO) and is traded on at least one stock exchange or in over-the-counter markets.
organizationTypeDescriptions.NON_PROFIT_CORPORATION: A Non-Profit Corporation is a legal entity that is formed for the purpose of serving a public or mutual benefit other than the pursuit or accumulation of profits for owners or investors.
organizationTypeDescriptions.GOVERNMENT_ENTITY: A Government Entity is a state, local, or federal organization that has a specific function or authority.
organizationTypeDescriptions.SOLE_PROPRIETORSHIP: An unincorporated business where the owner and the business are legally considered the same entity.
organizationTypeDescriptions.UNINCORPORATED_ASSOCIATION: An Unincorporated Association is a group of people who come together for a common purpose but do not register as a corporation or limited liability company.

generalOrganizationTypeDescriptions.SOLE_PROPRIETORSHIP: I'm the sole owner of my business
generalOrganizationTypeDescriptions.REGISTERED_BUSINESS: I manage a registered business, like a $t(onboarding-overview:organizationTypes.LIMITED_LIABILITY_COMPANY)
generalOrganizationTypeDescriptions.OTHER: I work in a different organizational, like a non-profit or state-owned entity
